医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
来自牛的杂交血吸虫使人类疾病控制变得复杂新的研究表明，需要有效控制牛血吸虫病才能实现消除人类疾病的目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Hybrid-schistosomes-from-cattle-complicate- human-disease-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Hybrid-schistosomes-from-cattle-complicate- human-disease-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f50182e9-15b4-4202-8e01-4db7a4409cb5 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 15:01:00 -0400 Hybrid schistosomes from cattle complicate human disease control
哌甲酯可能增强多发性硬化症患者的动眼功能凯斯勒基金会研究人员进行的一项试点研究显示，使用哌醋甲酯增强多发性硬化症 (MS) 患者的动眼功能具有良好的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/哌醋甲酯-may-enhance-oculomotor-function-in-individuals-with-multiple-sclerosis-Pilot-Study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Mmethylphenidate-may-enhance-oculomotor-function-in-individuals-with-multiple-sclerosis-Pilot-Study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=323f2427-f02c-4148-b9da-4cfb8335239d Wed, 26 Jun 2024 14:54:00 -0400 Methylphenidate may enhance oculomotor function in individuals with multiple sclerosis
研究揭示抑郁症与大脑活动之间的复杂关系Fanli Kong及其同事在《Cyborg Bionic Systems》杂志上发表的一项重要的新研究揭示了抑郁症与大脑活动之间的复杂关系，特别是关注大鼠的基底外侧杏仁核（BLA）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Study-sheds-light-on-the-intricate-relationship- Between-depression-and-brain-activity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Study-sheds-light-on-the-intricate-relationship- Between-depression-and-brain-activity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=047ab509-0dac-4162-8ae0-25c499da3789 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 14:43:58 -0400 Study sheds light on the intricate relationship between depression and brain activity
NCCN 调查显示关键癌症药物持续短缺国家综合癌症网络 (NCCN)——领先癌症中心的非营利联盟——正在发布其关于美国癌症药物短缺的最新调查的新结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/NCCN-survey-reveals-ongoing-shortages-in-crucial-cancer-medications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/NCCN-survey-reveals-ongoing-shortages-in-crucial-cancer-medications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0e9d9d9-e632-4382-8f6a-ba6b8c4ec924 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 14:41:26 -0400 NCCN survey reveals ongoing shortages in crucial cancer medications
目前的筛查指南可能会漏掉接受雌激素的跨性别女性的前列腺癌跨性别女性仍然面临患前列腺癌的风险。由雪松-西奈癌症研究人员领导的一项新研究发表在同行评审的《美国医学会杂志》上，得出的结论是，当前的筛查指南可能会漏掉接受激素治疗的跨性别女性的早期前列腺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Current-screening-guidelines-could-miss-prostate-cancer-in-transgender-women-receiving-estrogen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Current-screening-guidelines-could-miss-prostate-cancer-in-transgender-women-receiving-estrogen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4cb4f86-63ab-4747-889d-a679087f1c2e Wed, 26 Jun 2024 14:38:01 -0400 Current screening guidelines could miss prostate cancer in transgender women receiving estrogen
研究表明，社交媒体的使用不会以同样的方式影响所有青少年一项新的研究探讨了青春期和成年早期早期社交媒体使用与抑郁症之间的关系，发现某些因素可能会使社交媒体对抑郁症更具风险或保护作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Social-media-use-does-not-impact-all-adolescents-in-the-same-way-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Social-media-use-does-not-impact-all-adolescents-in-the-same-way-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2facf2e4-7cfa-42b8-8f46-4bf836cc6f19 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 13:34:15 -0400 Social media use does not impact all adolescents in the same way, study suggests
审查发现严格限制盐对心力衰竭患者没有临床益处几十年来，人们一直认为患有心力衰竭的人应该大幅减少饮食中盐的摄入量，但一些研究表明限制盐可能对这些患者有害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Review-finds-no-proven-clinical-benefit-to-strict-salt-restriction-for-病人-with-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Review-finds-no-proven-clinical-benefit-to-strict-salt-restriction-for-病人-with-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a07da70-a511-4120-b60c-737f18243fe8 Wed, 26 Jun 2024 13:30:05 -0400 Review finds no proven clinical benefit to strict salt restriction for patients with heart failure
专家发布指南，帮助安全、公平地实施 Palforzia 花生口服免疫疗法根据花生过敏儿童和青少年的焦点小组，专家为英国国家医疗服务体系 (NHS) 的临床医生发布了指南，帮助他们安全、公平地实施 Palforzia® 花生口服免疫疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Experts-publish-guidance-to-help-safely-and-equitically-implement-Palforzia-peanut-oral-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/Experts-publish-guidance-to-help-safely-and-equitically-implement-Palforzia-peanut-oral-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c715dcce-751d-485d-92b7-033116c62e7b Wed, 26 Jun 2024 13:25:00 -0400 Experts publish guidance to help safely and equitably implement Palforzia peanut oral immunotherapy
新工具预测热浪和寒潮带来的健康风险全球每年有超过 500 万人因环境温度过早死亡，其中仅西欧就超过 30 万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/New-tool-predicts-health-risks-from-heat-and-cold-waves.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/New-tool-predicts-health-risks-from-heat-and-cold-waves.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59839de7-23af-4088-a311-e9efd0d2501e Wed, 26 Jun 2024 13:16:03 -0400 New tool predicts health risks from heat and cold waves
美国法官裁定加州藐视监狱心理健康人员配置一名联邦法官认定加州监狱高级官员存在民事藐视法庭罪，因为他们未能聘请足够的心理健康专业人员来充分治疗数万名患有严重精神障碍的囚犯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/US-judge-finds-California-in-contempt-over-prison-mental-health-staffing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240626/US-judge-finds-California-in-contempt-over-prison-mental-health-staffing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b35f611-ce1b-4e0a-8bbb-d61777b1a69a Wed, 26 Jun 2024 13:06:33 -0400 US judge finds California in contempt over prison mental health staffing
